channel.title: Lanux-Ps ll New Rsps ll Eco Based
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt]lanux-Ps[/size][/center] [CENTER]Lanux-Ps is a 317 server loading higher revision data. We looking to be The Best. We are a small team ll Doing our best to make the players like the server and keep playing .
We update the server and bring new quality content on a weekly basis. The game itself has a balanced combat triangle and challenging experience rates.
Communication is as important as updating the server. Therefore we let the community participate in future updates to make the game enjoyable for everyone.
Still not convinced? Visit our homepage, check out the updates, create an account and convince yourself! -www.lanux-ps.weebly.com
[size=14pt]Features[/size] [SIZE=3]-Dwarf Multi Cannon -Single and Duo Slayer task -Boss Slayer Tasks -Gloabal server Announcements -Working Trivia bot -8 Minigames -11 Boss's -5 Floors of Dungeoneering -Team Dungeoneering -Working Construction -Teleporting Interfaces -Armadyl Staff and Runes -Crafting Armadyl Runes -100% Money Pouching. -100% Summoning -Processed Quest tab updating -100% Working Clan Chat -Dicing and Mithril Seeds -New Pest Control System added -Castle Wars system -Clan wars in the making -FFA Minigame -Quests -FULLY working bank tabs and bank system -Skilling Task and Point System -Youtube Management System -Custom Dungeoneering -BOSS PETS -Great Skills -Recieve cash in coin pouch for skilling -Inferno Adze -Burning effect [/SIZE]
[size=12pt]Donatorzone:[/size] -Donator skilling zone -Skilling benefits -Donator Only Items -Donator Boss[/SIZE]
[size=12pt]Other:[/size] [SIZE=3]-Comp cape requirements -Acc backups -IPLock -Antihack -Custom quest -Rest area -Charm collector ring -Crystal key chest - Wilderness Key chest -Players online code. -Custom NPCS -Rare drop messages if you want your loot shown -Personal kill counter -Bank tabs -Petzone -And much more[/SIZE][/CENTER]

item.title: Lanux-Ps ll New Rsps ll Eco Based
item.dc:creator: @rin_okumura rin okumura
item.description:
@rin_okumura wrote:

I see a interbellum source with a spec orb added and a buggy duel system that shows a mage ring I between the accept and decline button. I wish you luck if ama finds out your servers fucked in 2 seconds.

Read full topic

item.title: Lanux-Ps ll New Rsps ll Eco Based

item.description:
@tamer880 wrote:

[center][size=24pt]lanux-Ps[/size][/center]
[CENTER]Lanux-Ps is a 317 server loading higher revision data. We looking to be The Best.
We are a small team ll Doing our best to make the players like the server and keep playing .

We update the server and bring new quality content on a weekly basis. The game itself has a balanced combat triangle and challenging experience rates.

Communication is as important as updating the server. Therefore we let the community participate in future updates to make the game enjoyable for everyone.

Still not convinced? Visit our homepage, check out the updates, create an account and convince yourself! -www.lanux-ps.weebly.com

[size=14pt]Features[/size]
[SIZE=3]-Dwarf Multi Cannon
-Single and Duo Slayer task
-Boss Slayer Tasks
-Gloabal server Announcements
-Working Trivia bot
-8 Minigames
-11 Boss’s
-5 Floors of Dungeoneering
-Team Dungeoneering
-Working Construction
-Teleporting Interfaces
-Armadyl Staff and Runes
-Crafting Armadyl Runes
-100% Money Pouching.
-100% Summoning
-Processed Quest tab updating
-100% Working Clan Chat
-Dicing and Mithril Seeds
-New Pest Control System added
-Castle Wars system
-Clan wars in the making
-FFA Minigame
-Quests
-FULLY working bank tabs and bank system
-Skilling Task and Point System
-Youtube Management System
-Custom Dungeoneering
-BOSS PETS
-Great Skills
-Recieve cash in coin pouch for skilling
-Inferno Adze
-Burning effect [/SIZE]

[size=12pt]Donatorzone:[/size]
-Donator skilling zone
-Skilling benefits
-Donator Only Items
-Donator Boss[/SIZE]

[size=12pt]Other:[/size]

-Rest area

-Crystal key chest

    -And much more[/SIZE][/CENTER]
